title: Did the Paiden campaign spread after the "strength of the owner of the bar " as a" conscious investor "?
subtitle: A spokesman for Trump claimed that the Paiden campaign pulled an ad depicting the Michigan businessman Joe Malcolm because the campaign "captured" in a lie.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In October 2020, Joe Biden's presidential campaign pulled an announcement depicting Joe Malcolm because the campaign "captured" faked his business interests and his family's inherited wealth.
